safety.title: Safety Guidelines
safety.subtitle: Important safety information for UAP observers

observation: Never trespass on private property to observe phenomena
Maintain safe distances from airports and restricted airspace
Use proper safety equipment when observing at night
Inform someone of your observation location and expected return
Stay aware of your surroundings and weather conditions
reporting: Report only what you personally observed
Include objective details and measurements when possible
Respect the privacy of others in your reports
Do not include personal information of other witnesses
Be honest about uncertainties in your observations
